attributes.action: stop the use of 45foot containers on 40foot skeletals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following a personal study of the use of 45Ft containers on modified 40Ft skeletal trailers, accidents such as occurred on B/H Monday will happen again. The cab of the following vehicle will come into contact with the container(screen height)before the bumpers have any effect. I believe that to make/use a suitable trailer would be illegal on overall length legislations. this situation has come about by greed
